helpCenter.title: How can we help you?
helpCenter.subtitle: Search our knowledge base or browse categories below.
helpCenter.stillNeedHelpDesc: If you couldn't find the answer you were looking for, our support team is here to assist you.

items.question: How do I create an account?
items.answer: Click the 'Register' button on the homepage. Select whether you are a 'Customer' looking to hire or a 'Worker' looking for jobs. Fill in your details and verify your email to get started.

items.question: Is there a fee to join WorkLink?
items.answer: Signing up is completely free! We only charge a small platform fee when a job is successfully completed and paid for.

items.question: How do I verify my identity?
items.answer: Go to your Profile page and look for the 'Verification' badge. Upload a government-issued ID (like Aadhaar or Driver's License) to get the Verified badge, which increases trust.

items.question: How do I post a job?
items.answer: Click 'Post a Job' in the navigation bar. Provide a clear title, description, location, and budget. The more details you provide, the better matches you will get.

items.question: How do I accept a job assignment?
items.answer: When a customer assigns you a job, go to 'My Jobs'. You will see a timer and an 'Accept Work' button. Click it before the timer expires to secure the job.

items.question: Can I cancel a job after accepting?
items.answer: Yes, but repeated cancellations may affect your worker rating. Go to the Job Details page and select 'Cancel Job'. Please provide a valid reason.

items.question: My job posting isn't getting any applicants.
items.answer: Try increasing the budget or adding more details to the description. Ensure your location is accurate. You can also edit the job to make it more attractive.

items.question: When do I get paid?
items.answer: Payment is released immediately after the customer marks the job as 'Completed' and pays through the app. The funds will appear in your connected bank account within 24-48 hours.

items.question: What payment methods are supported?
items.answer: We support Credit/Debit Cards, UPI, and Net Banking. All payments are secured via Stripe/Razorpay.

items.question: Why was my payment declined?
items.answer: Check if your card has sufficient funds or if your bank is blocking the transaction. Ensure your internet connection is stable. If the issue persists, contact your bank.

items.question: How are platform fees calculated?
items.answer: WorkLink deducts a flat 10% fee from the total job amount to cover platform maintenance, insurance, and support services.

items.question: What if the worker doesn't show up?
items.answer: If a worker doesn't start travel or arrive within the expected time, you can cancel the job and repost it. Please report the worker via the 'Report' button on their profile.

items.question: What if the customer refuses to pay?
items.answer: If you have completed the work and uploaded proof (photos/videos), use the 'Raise Dispute' button on the Job Details page. Our support team will review the evidence and ensure you get paid.

items.question: Is my personal number shared?
items.answer: No. WorkLink uses a secure privacy-preserving call feature. When you call a user, your real number is masked.

items.question: How do I report inappropriate behavior?
items.answer: Go to the user's profile or the specific job chat, click the three dots menu, and select 'Report User'. We take safety violations very seriously.

items.question: How do I change my language?
items.answer: Go to Profile > Settings > Language Preference. We currently support English, and are adding regional languages soon.

items.question: The map isn't loading.
items.answer: Please ensure you have granted location permissions to the WorkLink app in your browser settings. Refresh the page and try again.
